briefTitle: Contraceptive Effectiveness and Safety of the SILCS Diaphragm

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Probability of Pregnancy Among Users of the SILCS Diaphragm Used With Contraceptive Gel Over 6 Months of Typical Use
Percent Women With Urogenital Adverse Events.
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinically evaluate the safety of the SILCS diaphragm used with contraceptive gel over 6 months of use.
